snippet.title: Slitterhead - Official Story Trailer
snippet.description:
Check out the story trailer for Slitterhead, a 3D third-person action-adventure game developed by Bokeh Game Studio. Players will explore the neon-lit streets of Kowlong to embody the Hyoki, an entity devoid of memory and physical form to eradicate monstrous beings known as "Slitterheads". Seek out allies and track dangerous organizations to put an end to their schemes and harness the power of their blood in the process. Slitterhead is launching on November 8 for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).

#IGN #Gaming
